original_title: 警視庁科学捜査研究所－文書鑑定の女－
overview: Yuka (Michiko Hada), a document appraisal engineer at the Institute of Scientific Research, sees a young woman fall from a building. By the time Yuka rushed to the scene, the woman was already dead and had something like a suicide note in her hand. You can feel the clearness of the character settings.
title: 警視庁科学捜査研究所－文書鑑定の女－
